https://tmrev.io/movie/339339-A Tale of Two Thieves 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rA0n31smo0XD0llQcgU7JXcI6nm.jpg In 1963 in the countryside in England, fifteen men pulled off 'The Great Train Robbery' netting today's equivalent of $85million. This incredible film features Gordon Goody, one of the instigators of the crime, for the first time ever, revealing the identity of the missing mastermind behind Britain's most famous heist- the elusive and mysterious 'Ulsterman'. A Tale of Two Thieves
